ygData.subject: RE: Hidden spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried him twice and got a rotted scroll so be aware you can get useless stuff in addition to spells. ... From: Kyle Plowden [mailto:damage43@hotmail.com]
ygData.messageBody:
I tried him twice and got "a rotted scroll" so be aware you can get useless
stuff in addition to spells.

-----Original Message-----
From: Kyle Plowden [mailto:damage43@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 5:09 AM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Hidden spells


From: "Kyle Plowden" <damage43@...>

Be sure to use 30 gold. It is just like giving away money if you don't.
I'm pretty sure about this. =)


>personally am considering getting some extra cash together and visiting
>the vendor in sro that gives out scrolls for 5pp.
